title: Research Tools
markdown:
These research tools have been generated by AMP-AD, MODEL-AD, M2OVE-AD, and Resilience-AD teams. Follow the links in the summaries below to learn how to obtain these resources for use in your own research. 

## Recombinant Adeno Associated Virus Vector (rAAV) Tools
**Description**: An extensive library of rAAV tools for the study of neurodegeneration.  
**Resource Contact**: [Todd Golde](mailto:tgolde@ufl.edu)  
**Provided By**: [The UFL-Mayo-ISB AMP-AD Grant](https://projectreporter.nih.gov/project_info_description.cfm?aid=8735841&icde=23452169&ddparam=&ddvalue=&ddsub=&cr=1&csb=default&cs=ASC)
**More Information**:  [This documentation](https://www.synapse.org/#!Synapse:syn7357091) provides an overview of promoters, capsids, fluorescent proteins, organelle markers and neurodegenerative disease relevant proteins that have been encoded in the available rAAV vectors and a list of the various rAAV constructs that have been generated. The documentation also describes any Material Transfer Agreements that are required to obtain the rAAV vectors.

##Mouse Models: University of Florida
**Description**:  Amyloid precursor protein (APP) and microtubule-associated protein tau (MAPT) mouse transgenic models.
**Resource Contact**: [Todd Golde](mailto:tgolde@ufl.edu)  
**Provided By**: [The UFL-Mayo-ISB AMP-AD Grant](https://projectreporter.nih.gov/project_info_description.cfm?aid=8735841&icde=23452169&ddparam=&ddvalue=&ddsub=&cr=1&csb=default&cs=ASC)
**More Information**: See the table below for a list of models. RNAseq data and other results from the CRND8, PS1/APP, MAPT_P301L, and rTG4510 models are available through [The TAUAPPms study](https://www.synapse.org/#!Synapse:syn3157182).

|Model Type |Model Name|Transgenes |Transgene Technology|Model Phenotypes |Contact/Access Requirement|
| --------- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
|APP Mouse TG|[CRND8]( http://www.jbc.org/content/276/24/21562.long)|APP695 SWE Indiana|Hamster Prion Promoter|Amyloid plaques by 2 months of age, Behavior deficits by 6 months|MTA from U. Toronto Contact Todd Golde UF or http://www.informatics.jax.org/allele/MGI:3589475|
|APP Mouse TG|BRI2-AB42|BRI2-Abeta42 (homozygous)|MoPRP|Amyloid plaques by 6-9 months , degeneration|MTA with Mayo Contact Todd Golde UF orhttps://www.jax.org/strain/007182|
|APP Mouse TG|[APPSwe/PS1 delta 9](http://www.alzforum.org/research-models/appps1)|APP695 SWE PS1 Delta 9|MoPrP|Amyloid by 6 months, behavioral deficits ~6month|MTA with Hopkins Contact David Borchelt UF or Jax Labs or https://www.jax.org/strain/004462|
|APP Mouse TG|APPsi|APP695 swe Indiana/tta|ttA CaMKIIalpha|Rapid pathology, behavior, behavior  attenuated by trangene suppression|Mutiple MTAs Contact David Borchelt UF|
|MAPT Mouse TG|[JNPL3 (homozygous)](http://www.alzforum.org/mutation/mapt-p301l) |MAPT P301 4R/0N|MoPrP|Tauopathy motor phenotypes|MTA with Mayo Contact Todd Golde/Jada Lewis UF http://www.informatics.jax.org/allele/MGI:3604148|
|MAPT Mouse TG|[rTG4510](http://www.alzforum.org/research-models/rtgtaup301l4510)|MAPT P301 4R/0N|tta CamKIIa|Tauopathy degerntion of cortex and hippocampus|Multiple MTAs Contact Jada Lewis UF or https://www.jax.org/strain/024854|

##Mouse Models: Jackson Labs
**Description**:  Familial and late onset AD mouse models.
**Resource Contact**: Order through [The Jackson Laboratory](https://www.jax.org/)
**Provided By**: [The MODEL-AD Program](https://projectreporter.nih.gov/project_info_description.cfm?aid=9205077&icde=31682752)
**More Information**: See the table below for a list of models. The [MODEL-AD site](https://model-ad.org/strain-table/) has additional detail on the available mouse models. See [the JAX_APPPS1 study](https://www.synapse.org/#!Synapse:syn9850001) for RNAseq data on the mouse models.

| Type                         | Common name                                           | Genetic background                                            | availability | JAX # | source        |

##Drosophila Melanogaster Models
**Description**: A transgenic Drosophila line carrying human Aβ42 using the GAL4-UAS system. The Aβ42 transgenic lines were crossed to elav-GAL4 for neuron-specific expression. 
**Resource Contact**: [Koichi Iijima](mailto:iijimakm@ncgg.go.jp)
**Provided By**: [The Mt. Sinai School of Medicine AMP-AD Grant](https://projectreporter.nih.gov/project_info_description.cfm?aid=8735843&icde=23452677&ddparam=&ddvalue=&ddsub=&cr=1&csb=default&cs=ASC)
**More Information**: See the  [Mount Sinai Drosophila Melanogaster Models](https://www.synapse.org/#!Synapse:syn4587607) study for RNAseq data on the Aβ42 and other Drosophila lines.
